originInfo.publisher: Louisiana. Dept. of Wildlife and Fisheries

mods.abstract: Out of the past' would be a good title for this picture. It shows the result of a 'ring-neck' goose hunt by members of the Florence Club at Gueydan, La., in the days before the four-a-day limit became effective. Left to right in the picture are: Dr. George Lowrie, G.E. Welch, club manager; Albert B. Lowrie, a guide, and Carl Tuttle, one of the club owners.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.accessCondition: Copyright of federal and state documents is in the public domain.
